overview: In the aftermath of an alien insurrection which led humanity to flee for the stars, a lone astronaut is left behind on earth to monitor the progress of the ongoing invasion. Now faced with a future of indefinite isolation, the astronaut will reconnect with the desolate fractures of the planet they once called home, and uncover who they truly are.
tagline: Leaving him behind wasn't a choice, it was a sacrifice.
title: The last man on Earth
